Use the code "wkram" without quotes at checkout, and receive 32MB additional RAM on the Virtual-Dedicated Servers
---
Use the code"wkdisk" without quotes at checkout, and receive a free 2GB Disk Space Upgrade
---
Use the code"wkbandwidth" without quotes at checkout, and receive 50GB Bandwidth Upgrade
---
Use the code"wk10life" without quotes at checkout, and receive 10% OFF for the life of the account
---
Use the code"wk1month" without quotes at checkout, gives you 50% OFF for the first month



Webkore.net offers the next step in the evolution of the webhosting industry. Virtual-Dedicated Servers are as powerful as dedicated servers, but without the cost. Be capable of selling reseller accounts and shared accounts, on powerful VDS'. Get onto the Softlayer network, at a fraction of a dedicated server's price. Seamless upgrades and downgrades also ensure the best pricing and solution for your needs.

Basic details :

ACCOUNT INFORMATION
:: 128 MB Minimum Ram
:: 512 MB Burstable Ram
:: Disk Storage: 10GB
:: Monthly Transfer: 175GB
:: 2 IP addresses
:: Free backups (full VDS backup)
:: Optional Rollback Backups
:: Full control via Customer Portal
:: 2 Hour setup time
:: A la carte server Management
:: HyperVM Control Panel


CONTROL PANELS
:: cPanel
:: Plesk 30 w/ powerpack

:: Debian 3.1
:: Fedora Core 4 & 5
:: OpenSuse 10

PRICING

:: Browse our website for more VDS plans


PAYMENT OPTIONS

SUPPORT
:: Trouble Ticket support system (24/7) . Staff onsite 24 hours a day. To view our average response time http://www.webkore.net/avgtimes (updated every 15 minutes)
:: Client-Only Forums
:: Optional End-User Support


GUARANTEES
:: 14 day money back guarantee
:: 30 minute or less response times
:: 99.9% Uptime SLA - Every 0.1% below 99.9% will result in 10% credit


SERVERS & NETWORK
:: Enterprise level servers. Quad core servers, between 4GB and 16GB of Registered ECC RAM, Raid 1 Sata2 hard drives
:: Have your websites hosted on the premium Softlayer network, in Dallas, Texas. Have access to 5 Tier-1 bandwidth providers for fast global access.


ABOUT WEBKORE.NET
:: Webkore.net has been in the hosting industry for 5 years.
:: Webkore Internet Services is a premium hosting company
:: Webkore.net is based in Montreal, Canada
:: Now hosting over 17,500 domains



If you have any questions, just contact our sales department (live chat or by email) and we'll be glad to answer them
